setup.title: Tepora Setup

errors.save_config_failed: Failed to save configuration. Please try again.

steps.language_desc: Choose your preferred language to customize Tepora.

setup.download_warning_desc: Some models are not in the allowlist. Please review the warnings and confirm to proceed.
setup.ready_desc: Tepora is ready to be your AI companion.
setup.custom_desc: Specify your own GGUF model repositories and filenames.
setup.storage_desc: Tepora runs locally. Models will be stored in your AppData folder.
setup.storage_requirement_hint: Models are stored locally in your AppData folder. Ensure you have sufficient disk space.
setup.installing_desc: This may take a few minutes depending on your internet connection. We are preparing a personalized AI experience for you.
setup.offline_privacy_tip: Tepora runs completely offline once installed. Your data stays on your device, ensuring maximum privacy and security.

app.loadingHint: This may take a few seconds

errors.troubleshootHint: Make sure the backend server is running on the expected port.

search_tool.description: Configure the search engine and credentials.

general.advanced_settings_desc: Adjust attempt limits and safety constraints.

card.custom_prompt_placeholder: You are a helpful AI assistant...

agents.professionals_coming_soon_desc: Agents for specialized task execution are currently under development.

modal.model_desc: Select the model configuration for this agent.

agents.error_duplicate_key: This ID is already in use.
agents.nsfw_desc: Allow generation of restricted content. Use with caution.

custom_agents.description: Manage professional prompts, allowed tools, and default models.
custom_agents.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this professional?
custom_agents.error_duplicate_id: This ID is already in use.

modal.prompt_desc: Define the agent's behavior and personality.

privacy.label: Privacy

privacy.description: Manage external communications and data sharing settings.

mcp.store_hint: Search the registry and install servers.
mcp.registered_description: Start/stop servers and inspect configuration details.

models.label: Models
models.title: Models
models.manager_description: Configure how the system manages LLM processes and resources.
models.add_description: Add new models to your local library.
models.list_description: Manage, delete, and reorder registered models.
models.defaults_description: Assign default models for each role.
models.no_models: No models configured. Click 'Add New Model' to add one.
models.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this model configuration?
models.text_model_desc: Select the model used for text generation.
models.embedding_model_desc: Select the model used for memory and retrieval.
models.character_model_desc: Select the default model used for characters.
models.executor_models_desc: Assign default models for each professional task type.
models.no_models_for_role: No models found for this role.

add_modal.title: Add Model
add_modal.path_required: Cannot resolve file path. This feature requires a desktop environment.

consent_dialog.title: Confirm Download
consent_dialog.description: This download requires your confirmation before proceeding:

detail.changes_note: Changes to model parameters will apply on next load.
detail.n_ctx_desc: Maximum number of tokens the model can process at once.

updates.title: Updates
updates.description: Manage application and inference engine updates.

memory.label: Memory
memory.title: EM-LLM (Episodic Memory)
memory.description: Configure episodic memory and history limits.

max_input_length.label: Max Input Length
max_input_length.description: Maximum characters allowed in user input.

graph_recursion_limit.label: Max Attempts
graph_recursion_limit.description: Maximum number of attempts for an agent (safety brake).

tool_execution_timeout.label: Tool Execution Timeout
tool_execution_timeout.description: Seconds before a tool execution times out.

tool_approval_timeout.label: Tool Approval Timeout
tool_approval_timeout.description: Seconds before a tool approval request expires.

web_fetch_max_chars.label: Web Fetch Max Chars
web_fetch_max_chars.description: Maximum characters to fetch from a web page.

dangerous_patterns.label: Dangerous Patterns
dangerous_patterns.description: Regex patterns to block from user input for security.

descriptions.cache_size: Number of models to keep loaded in memory.

max_tokens.label: Local Context Window
max_tokens.description: Maximum tokens for the active conversation context.

min_event_size.label: Min Event Size
min_event_size.description: Minimum tokens to form a memory event.

retrieved_events.label: Retrieved Events
retrieved_events.description: Number of past events to recall.

repr_topk.label: Repr Top K
repr_topk.description: Top K tokens for event representation.

default_limit.label: Message Count
default_limit.description: Default number of messages to retrieve from history.

explorer.title: Saved Events
explorer.description: View and manage saved episodic events.

info.title: Configuration Information
info.description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) tools allow the AI to interact with external data and services. Currently, MCP configuration is managed via a local JSON configuration file.

config_path.title: Configuration Path
config_path.helper: To add new MCP servers, please edit this file directly and restart the backend.

details.title: Server Details: {{name}}

autorun.label: Auto-run
autorun.description: Enable this server on application startup.

command.label: Command
command.description: Executable used to launch the MCP server.

env.label: Environment Variables
env.description: Use KEY=VALUE format, one per line.

details.env_invalid: Use KEY=VALUE format for env vars.

mode.label: Connection Mode
mode.description: Control which servers are allowed to connect.

confirmation.label: Tool Confirmation
confirmation.description: Ask for permission before executing tools.

noServers.title: No MCP Servers
noServers.description: Click 'Add Server' to install servers from the official registry.

store.title: MCP Server Store
store.runtimeDescription: Choose a runtime to execute this server.

config_path.label: MCP Configuration File
config_path.description: Path to the JSON file defining MCP servers.

global_manager.title: LLM Manager Global
global_manager.description: Process management and health check configuration.

configurations.title: Model Configurations
configurations.description: Detailed configuration for each model instance.

web_search.label: Allow Internet Access
web_search.description: Allow the AI to use internet search to retrieve information.
web_search.warning_query: Search queries will be sent to Google API
web_search.warning_api: Your configured API key will be used for search requests

redact_pii.label: Personal Data Protection
redact_pii.description: Automatically redact personal information (email addresses, phone numbers, etc.) from logs, and from web search queries before they are sent to external services.

tool_errors.search_disabled_privacy: Web search is disabled by privacy settings.
tool_errors.search_disabled_api_keys: Google Custom Search is disabled (API keys not configured).
tool_errors.search_timeout: Search request timed out. Please try again later.
tool_errors.search_connection_error: Connection failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
tool_errors.search_rate_limit: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
tool_errors.search_access_denied: API access denied. Please check your API key and permissions.
tool_errors.search_http_error: HTTP error occurred with status code {{status_code}}.
tool_errors.search_invalid_response: Invalid response from Google API. Please try again.
tool_errors.url_invalid_scheme: URL must include a valid http/https scheme and host.
tool_errors.url_no_hostname: Could not determine hostname from URL.
tool_errors.url_blocked_private: Access to {{host}} is blocked for security reasons (private/local network).
tool_errors.url_blocked_private_ip: Access to private/local IP addresses is blocked for security reasons.
tool_errors.fetch_not_html: URL is not an HTML page (Content-Type: {{content_type}}).
